item.title: [GRA5/GRA7/GRA9/SBG5/WAW1/SGP1/BHS5/SYD1/DE1/UK1/VA1/OR1][Public cloud]]End of life for Kubernetes1.20
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 21, 08:00 UTC  -  Mar 23, 17:00 UTC

Jan 4, 02:05 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 21/03/2023 08:00 UTC
End time : 23/03/2023 17:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact except for the apps that do not support the new version (1.21).
Service improvement : The aim of this maintenance is to upgrade deprecated clusters to a supported newer version (1.21).

item.title: [Global][Databases] - MongoDB upgrade
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 16, 01:00 UTC  -  Mar 26, 23:00 UTC

Jan 30, 22:40 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 13/03/2023 01:00 UTC
End time : 26/03/2023 23:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact is expected for business and enterprise plans, a small downtime may be experienced for essential plans (less than 15mn).
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade of our MongoDB offer.

item.title: [EU/CA][LogsDataPlatform] - TLS 1.3 by default
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 15, 13:00 - 14:00 UTC

Feb 16, 09:14 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 15/03/2023 13:00 UTC
End time : 15/03/2023 14:00 UTC
Service impact : None, except if you do not support TLS 1.3.
Service improvement: Following our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing an internal maintenance to enable TLS 1.3 by default on Logs Data Platform.

The cipher suites supported after this maintenance will be :
* TLS 1.2 Cipher Suites:
The server accepted the following 3 cipher suites:
TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_CHACHA20_POLY1305_SHA256 256 ECDH: X25519 (253 bits)
TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384 256 ECDH: prime256v1 (256 bits)
TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256 128 ECDH: prime256v1 (256 bits)
* TLS 1.3 Cipher Suites:
TLS_CHACHA20_POLY1305_SHA256 256 ECDH: X25519 (253 bits)
TLS_AES_256_GCM_SHA384 256 ECDH: X25519 (253 bits)
TLS_AES_128_GCM_SHA256 128 ECDH: X25519 (253 bits)

item.title: [Global][Public cloud] Keystone migration (auth.cloud.ovh.net)
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 28, 06:00 - 10:00 UTC

Feb 15, 13:27 UTC
Update - The scope of the maintenance has been adjusted.

Feb 15, 03:57 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 28/02/2023 06:00 UTC
End time : 28/02/2023 10:00 UTC
Service impact : During operations, the following action will not be available:
• Creation of new EC2 credentials
• Creation of new trust/projet/users/role assignment
• Openstack password reset
• Creation of new heat stack
• Creation of new mistral cron trigger
• Creation of the first data processing job of a public cloud project
• Creation of the first k8s managed cluster of a public cloud project
• Creation of the first AI model deployment of a public cloud project
Note that all other actions, like token or openstack ressource creation will still be possible, and token issued before the migration will also work after.
To ensure 0 downtime during the migration, beware to follow the DNS without cache.
Service improvement: Major upgrade of the Openstack Identity service. This will allow us to enable identity federation in the future.

item.title: [GRA1][Storgage] - CEPH performance degradation
item.description:
Feb 27, 15:05 UTC
Monitoring - Our technical teams resolved the issue.
We will monitoring the result for the time being.

Feb 27, 14:48 UTC
Identified - Start time : 27/02/2023 14:36 UTC
Service impact : Some CEPH cluster are unavailable.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams need to shut down some CEPH cluster on to resolved an issue.
An update will be post when the clusters are shut down.
